## build() function

Creates a new ui builder and mounts the result to the given DOM element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function build(el: HTMLElement | string, builder?: (b: Builder) => void): Builder;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  el | <code>HTMLElement &#124; string</code> |  |
|  builder | <code>(b: Builder) =&gt; void</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Builder`
